statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity_on_hand > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_replenished_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_on_hand, last_replenished_date FROM inventory_tracking WHERE sales_data->>'sales_revenue' > '10000';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity_on_hand DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity_on_hand > 10
SELECT product_name, last_replenished_date FROM inventory_tracking WHERE sales_data->>'sales_region' = 'North America'
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT MAX(quantity_on_hand) as max_quantity, MIN(quantity_on_hand) as min_quantity FROM inventory_tracking
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > minimum_stock;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, replenish_threshold FROM Inventory ORDER BY replenish_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock FROM Inventory WHERE replenish_threshold > 50;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM SalesData WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock, replenish_threshold FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock AND replenish_threshold < 60;
SELECT i.product_name, s.quantity_sold, s.sales_amount FROM Inventory i INNER JOIN SalesData s ON i.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY s.quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < 50;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, sold_units FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > sold_units;
SELECT * FROM replenish WHERE replenish_quantity > 100 ORDER BY replenish_date;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales INNER JOIN inventory ON sales.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC

SELECT product_name, current_stock, replenish_quantity FROM inventory LEFT JOIN replenish ON inventory.product_id = replenish.product_id WHERE replenish_quantity > 0 ORDER BY current_stock DESC, replenish_quantity ASC

SELECT product_name, current_stock, sold_units, replenish_date FROM inventory LEFT JOIN replenish ON inventory.product_id = replenish.product_id LEFT JOIN sales ON inventory.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sold_units > 0 ORDER BY replenish_date DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity < 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, replenishment_date, replenishment_quantity FROM stock_replenishment WHERE replenishment_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY replenishment_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, next_replenishment_date FROM automatic_replenishment WHERE next_replenishment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE minimum_stock < 10;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock;
SELECT replenishment_id, product_id, replenishment_date FROM Replenishment WHERE replenishment_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Replenishment WHERE replenishment_quantity >= 50 AND replenishment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT product_id, trigger_type FROM Replenishment_Trigger ORDER BY product_id, trigger_type DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock FROM Inventory JOIN Replenishment ON Inventory.product_id = Replenishment.product_id WHERE replenishment_quantity < 30;
